testSteps.step: Navigate to the flight booking search page
testSteps.expectedResult: The page title should be 'Compare and book cheap flights with ease'

testSteps.step: Verify the 'From' dropdown is populated with destinations
testSteps.expectedResult: The 'From' dropdown should contain 'MAA Chennai International Airport' as an option

testSteps.step: Verify the 'To' dropdown is populated with destinations
testSteps.expectedResult: The 'To' dropdown should contain 'Latvia', 'Yekaterinburg', 'North Sea', etc. as options

testSteps.step: Verify the 'Travel dates' field is populated with the current date
testSteps.expectedResult: The 'Travel dates' field should be populated with the current date

testSteps.step: Verify the 'Travelers' field is populated with the default value
testSteps.expectedResult: The 'Travelers' field should be populated with '1 adult' as the default value

testSteps.step: Enter 'MAA Chennai International Airport' in the 'From' field
testSteps.expectedResult: The page should display a list of flights from Chennai International Airport

testSteps.step: Select 'Latvia' as the destination in the 'To' field
testSteps.expectedResult: The page should display a list of flights from Chennai International Airport to Latvia

testSteps.step: Select 'Sat, Jan 24, 2026' as the departure date
testSteps.expectedResult: The page should display a list of flights from Chennai International Airport to Latvia on Sat, Jan 24, 2026

testSteps.step: Select 'Economy' as the class of travel
testSteps.expectedResult: The page should display a list of economy flights from Chennai International Airport to Latvia on Sat, Jan 24, 2026

testSteps.step: Select 'Direct flights only' as the flight type
testSteps.expectedResult: The page should display only direct flights from Chennai International Airport to Latvia on Sat, Jan 24, 2026
The page should display one-way flights from Chennai International Airport to Latvia on Sat, Jan 24, 2026
